title: Game Bug Splats with 2 monitors
body: So practically whenever I am watching a video or doing anything on my 2nd monitor (which is not set as my main monitor) and league starts to load via after the character selection screen the game instantly crashes and goes into bug splat. Before even showing the loading screen. In order for me to get into the game then I have to wait till all other players are loaded into the game in which I can then reconnect. Has anyone else had this issue, Also before I am asking the graphics card I have is an nvidia geforce gtx 650 ti boost. Also I am sharing that graphics card with both monitors. Thank you

replies.body:
Hey Ducktales,

This happens generally due to out of date graphics drivers. I recommend you go [here](http://www.nvidia.com/Download/Scan.aspx?lang=en-us) to download the most up to date drivers for your 650ti. Please let me know if this works for you!
already did quite some time ago, not the reason
After looking at your DxDiag, I see that your graphics drivers are out of date by several versions. I strongly recommend you update your graphics drivers.

Thats a problem with your hardware, i run 3 monitors. u need to update your drivers. also there could be an issue with your ram try running memtest for a few hours. whats your system specs. including motherboard?
